briefTitle: Breast Lesion Analysis for Tomosynthesis Mammography
officialTitle: Tomosynthesis Mammography: Computer-Aided Analysis of Breast Lesions
conditions: Breast Cancer, Abnormal Findings on Radiological Examination of Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Achieve earlier breast cancer detection and characterization
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects scheduled for core biopsy of a breast lesion

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant females
